sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
relates to a particular subject
, je povezano z določeno vsebino.

seg.quote: I want to ask you a question that relates to electricity.

sense.def:
Kadar dve stvari
relate to each other
, med njima obstaja določena povezava.

seg.quote: Let us examine the way that the words in a sentence relate to each other.
How the two agreements related is unimportant.

sense.def:
To relate one thing to another
pomeni videti ali povedati, kakšna povezava obstaja med dvema stvarema.

seg.quote: It enables students to relate their theory to the real world.

sense.def:
To relate to other people
pomeni vzpostavljati in vzdrževati stike z drugimi in se vesti do njih tako ali drugače.

seg.quote: Children need to learn to relate to other children.

sense.def:
To relate a story
pomeni povedati zgodbo;

seg.quote: Davis related the experience of three Cuban girls.
